title: Thanks for the LP loss riot
body:
I love losing LP for free thanks to Riot Games.  

Get into a lobby.  Bring up OP.gg

Top-> Top main
Mid -> mid main
Support-> jungle main
Jungle -> support main
Adc -> support main

3 of my teammates are on a losing streak.   I dodge and lose 10 lp.  Thanks Riot.  Stellar matchmaking again.
